Articles.Content: When I click launch it does not launch it just shows the earth.

Welcome to the forums!

I can tell you're frustrated, but you're gonna have to provide a bit more detail.  Can you describe exactly what you're looking at?  Post a screenshot?
Smells like a corrupted save file to me. More info please.
Please read this thread (and this thread too if you're using mods), and post the required information: without it it is impossible to find the cause of your bug.

Are you talking about launching the game or launching a ship?

If it's the game, are you using the Launcher or the KSP.exe file?

The launcher can be buggy sometimes, so try the exe  if that's the problem your talking about.
If this is launching a rocket, I've had this happen sometimes ... I just switch to map view and back, as it was just zoomed WAY out...
